title: Halloween
description: __% off Halloween-themed items, last-minute offer.

title: Early Access Starts Now
description: Build anticipation and excitement for the Early Access period, giving customers a sense of exclusivity.

title: Early Access in Full Swing
description: Remind subscribers that Early Access deals are live and create urgency with time-sensitive language.

title: Early Access at Its Peak
description: Keep the momentum going by emphasizing scarcity and limited-time availability.

title: Early Access Ending Soon
description: Use FOMO (fear of missing out) to encourage customers to act before Early Access ends.

title: BFCM Early Access Almost Over
description: Emphasize the urgency of shopping before Early Access closes and the main Black Friday event begins.

title: Early Access Ends Soon
description: This is the last opportunity to take advantage of Early Access before the main Black Friday sale begins.

title: Thanksgiving Specials
description: Express appreciation for your customers while reminding them of ongoing or upcoming deals.

title: Giving Tuesday
description: Use Giving Tuesday as an opportunity to promote self-care and encourage customers to prioritize themselves with exclusive deals.

title: Extended Savings Alert
description: Let customers know they still have time to take advantage of the Black Friday/Cyber Monday deals they may have missed.

title: Countdown to Holiday Savings
description: Build excitement as the holidays approach, reminding shoppers to complete their gift buying before time runs out.

title: Last-Minute Stocking Stuffers
description: Target last-minute shoppers with small, thoughtful gift ideas that can still arrive in time for the holidays.

title: Holiday Gift Frenzy
description: Promote the excitement of finding all holiday gifts in one place with special deals for the season.

title: Season of Surprises
description: Focus on delivering unexpected value to your customers with special surprise deals.

title: Task: Set Up Automated Flows for BFCM
description: Ensure automated abandoned emails and SMS are ready to trigger during BFCM. Tailor messaging to include urgency and highlight limited-time deals.

title: Task: Finalize Inventory Checks
description:
Stock Assessment: Make sure high-demand products are well-stocked to avoid running out mid-event.

Low Stock Alerts: Set up alerts for products nearing depletion to adjust promotions accordingly.

title: Task: Segment Your Audience
description:
Create Segments: Divide your SMS list into key groups like VIPs, past purchasers, first-time buyers, and high-intent customers.

Targeted Messaging: Craft specific messages for each segment to personalize the experience and boost conversions.

title: Task: Create a BFCM SMS Calendar
description: Plan out the exact days and times you’ll send messages. Include reminders for early access, ongoing deals, low-stock warnings, and last-chance offers

title: Task: Promote SMS Sign-Up on Other Channels
description: Use email, social media, and your website to encourage customers to join your SMS list before BFCM. Highlight exclusive deals and perks available only through SMS.

title: Task: Use SMS to Upsell and Cross-Sell Post-Purchase
description:
Send personalized product recommendations immediately after a customer receives their purchase.

Example: “Thanks for your order! Complete your look with [Related Product] at 10% off.

title: Task: Send Multiple SMS Messages During Black Friday
description:
Sending more than one message on Black Friday ensures your deals stand out amidst the overwhelming competition. With customers shopping at different times, multiple reminders help create urgency, target various time zones, and capture both early and last-minute buyers. This strategy keeps your brand top-of-mind and maximizes engagement throughout the day.

Examples:
Morning (8 AM)
Afternoon (12 PM)
Evening (6 PM)

title: Black Friday Kickoff
description: Launch the main Black Friday sale with a sense of excitement and urgency.

title: Black Friday Kickoff 2
description: Launch the main Black Friday sale with a sense of excitement and urgency.

title: Black Friday Kickoff 3
description: Launch the main Black Friday sale with a sense of excitement and urgency.

title: Send Multiple SMS Messages During Cyber Monday
description: Cyber Monday is one of the most competitive online shopping days, and sending multiple SMS messages ensures your offers stay visible amid the digital noise. With customers browsing throughout the day, staggered messages can target different shopping behaviors—early birds, midday deal seekers, and last-minute buyers. This strategy maximizes engagement, boosts sales, and helps capture every possible conversion opportunity.

title: Cyber Monday Has Arrived
description: Highlight the urgency and exclusivity of the biggest online shopping day. Encourage immediate action.

title: Cyber Monday Has Arrived 2
description: Highlight the urgency and exclusivity of the biggest online shopping day. Encourage immediate action.

title: Cyber Monday Has Arrived 3
description: Highlight the urgency and exclusivity of the biggest online shopping day. Encourage immediate action.

title: Last Night of Hanukkah
description: Cheers to the last night of Hanukkah! Make sure your subscribers know you're thinking about them with a message of gratitude and luck for a lovely rest of the year.

title: Super Saturday
description: We're just ONE week away from the holiday weekend. Offer a flash sale to entice your customers to get those last minute purchases made in time for the big day.

title: Christmas Eve
description: Got a deal to share with the subscribers who waited to shop until the very last minute? Share it on Christmas Eve!

title: Christmas Day
description: Wish your subscribers a wonderful Christmas Day filled with friends and family by sending out a heartfelt message — no promo necessary.

title: Christmas Sale - Announcement
description: Let your subscribers know you're sending them a gift for the holidays: a 1-day flash sale or a super special deal on products!

title: Christmas Sale - Reminder
description: Remind your subscribers to take a break from the holiday festivities and send some cheer their way with your Christmas sale!

title: Christmas Sale - Last Chance
description: Want to remind your subscribers of your deals before the day is over? Send them a very last chance message! Pro tip: send it to a segment of those who have clicked on the previous messages.

title: Boxing Day
description: Christmas may be over, but the sales sure aren't! Offer your subscribers a flash sale on Boxing Day to clear out extra inventory or to make room for new arrivals for 2025.

title: Kwanzaa Begins
description: Christmas and Hanukkah may be over, but Kwanzaa is just getting started! Be sure to share a message of celebration with your subscribers.

title: Winter Solstice
description: Winter is here! Spotlight your cold-weather best-sellers or offer a sitewide sale for the big day.

title: National Fruitcake Day
description: Forgot a gift? No problem! Fruitcake to the rescue! Celebrate National Fruitcake Day and make your holiday gatherings extra special!

title: Holiday Shipping - Last Call
description: Time is running out! Make sure your subscribers take advantage of your shipping offers before it's too late.

title: Holiday Shipping - Second Reminder
description: Sometimes subscribers need a push to take advantage of your deals! Pro tip: include the date of when a product needs to be ordered for guaranteed delivery by the 24th.

title: Holiday Shipping - First Reminder
description: If you're offering free shipping or a special rate for more than one day, try sending a reminder to your subscribers who clicked on the link of the first announcement, but haven't made a purchase yet.

title: Rewards Program
description: Turn holiday shoppers into loyal customers. Highlight rewards benefits during peak shopping season to boost program signups.

title: Holiday Giving
description: Show subscribers how their holiday shopping creates real impact. Share your brand's charitable partnerships and give customers a chance to be part of something meaningful.

title: Holiday Gift Cards
description: Whether you're running a sale or not, suggest Gift Cards for the indecisive shoppers and send a broadcast with all the info!

title: New Year's Eve
description: Greet your customers and send your wishes for them this 2025. Not everything has to be a sale during moments like this, and your customers will appreciate it.

title: End of Year Sale
description: Join your subscribers in closing the year on a high note with a special markdown!

title: National Chocolate Candy Day
description: Encourage your subscribers to indulge in the nostalgic to the decadent this holiday season!

title: National Champagne Day
description: The New Year's spirit is already catching on! Celebrate with your subscribers with a promotion on your recommended bottle.

title: Dry January
description: Whether your brand offers alcohol alternatives or you just want to promote a new health product this month, sharing a broadcast about Dry January is the perfect opportunity!

title: Self Love Month
description: Run a month-long promotion in honor of Self Love Month or simply send a heartfelt message to your subscribers as a reminder to take care of themselves this month and every month.

title: New Year's Day
description: New year, new broadcast, right? Share a message celebrating the day or offer a flash sale sitewide or product specific.

title: Long Weekend Sale
description: Start off the first month of 2025 strong with a weekend-long promotion.

title: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
description: Honor the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. by sharing a message of gratitude, reflecting on his impact, or providing educational resources to your subscribers.

title: International Mind-Body Wellness Day
description: Kick off the new year by prioritizing self-care. Celebrate International Mind-Body Wellness Day with actionable tips or a special 24-hour sale to inspire your audience!

title: National Keto Day
description: Support your subscribers in reaching their health goals with a broadcast celebrating National Keto Day! Highlight how your products make sticking to a keto lifestyle easier and more enjoyable.

title: National Cuddle Up Day
description: Celebrate National Cuddle Up Day by giving your subscribers the perfect excuse to cozy up! Promote a flash sale or your latest collection to keep them warm and comfy.

title: National Winter Skin Relief Day
description: Help your subscribers beat the harsh effects of winter on their skin. Use National Winter Skin Relief Day to spotlight your cold-weather skincare essentials and share how they can restore that healthy glow!

title: National Dress Up Your Pet Day
description: Celebrate National Dress Up Your Pet Day by encouraging your subscribers to spoil their furry friends! Promote your latest products or offer a special discount to make their pets the best-dressed in town.

title: National Hat Day
description: Give your subscribers a reason to shop! Offer a special promotion on your hat collection and thank them for being loyal customers.

title: National Get To Know Your Customer Day
description: Take this opportunity to connect with your subscribers and learn how to serve them better. Use a quick survey to gather feedback and reward their time with an exclusive discount.

title: National Use Your Gift Card Day
description: Remind your subscribers to use their holiday gift cards or run a promotion to boost new gift card sales. Remind them to shop or discover your latest offerings.

title: National Cheese Lover's Day
description: Food brands: Celebrate National Cheese Lover's Day with an irresistible offer for your subscribers. Highlight a promotion or special deal that honors everyone’s favorite dairy delight!

title: International Sweatpants Day
description: Celebrate the ultimate day for comfort! Use International Sweatpants Day to promote your loungewear collection or offer a special discount to keep your subscribers cozy and stylish.

title: National Compliment Day
description: Everyone loves a kind word! Use National Compliment Day to show your subscribers how much you appreciate them. Pair a heartfelt message with a flash sale to thank them for their support.

title: National Spouses Day
description: Show your subscribers some love for National Spouses Day by offering deals they can’t resist. Warm them up ahead of Valentine’s Day with special promotions!

title: National Green Juice Day
description: Give your subscribers a fresh reason to sip and nourish! Use National Green Juice Day to highlight your top wellness products or offer a deal on a multi-day cleanse to inspire their healthy habits.

title: National Hot Chocolate Day
description: Warm up your subscribers with a sweet offer in honor of National Hot Chocolate Day. Spotlight your best-sellers or new arrivals and pair it with a cozy discount!

title: New Year's Day Offers
description: Day 1 of 365. Celebrate it with a broadcast to your subscribers offering a sitewide flash sale or a promotion on a best-selling product.

title: New Year's Sales
description: New year, new sale! Send a broadcast to celebrate the start of the new year by showing off current promotions and sales.

title: New Year's Resolutions
description: New year, new YOU! Get your subscribers inspired with a heartfelt message or help them jumpstart their goals with a promotion.

title: Health & Wellness - Customer Education
description: The new year is the best time for your brand to highlight ways to maintain health and wellness goals! Share healthy recipes, blog posts, and more.

title: Health & Wellness - Subscription Push
description: Encourage your subscribers to stay on top of their health goals with a broadcast about your brand's subscription services.

title: National Hobby Month
description: There's no time like the start of the new year to learn something new! Celebrate National Hobby Month by sharing a spotlight on a best-selling product or run a 24-hour sale.

title: Valentine's Day 2/14 - Order Ahead
description: Don't let your subscribers procrastinate finding the perfect present ahead of Valentine's Day. Make sure you offer chances to order ahead!

title: National Protein Day
description: ~#|BRAND|#~: Happy National Protein Day! We're celebrating with a flash sale on our best-selling powders: tap the link below to save ~#|DISCOUNT|#~% with ~#|CODE|#~ at checkout. ~#|LINK|#~

title: Valentine's Day - Order Ahead
description: Never underestimate the importance of reminding your subscribers to order ahead! Pro tip: offering an incentive like a limited time discount or free shipping will encourage them to move quickly.

title: Valentine's Day - Self Care
description: Valentine's Day is the time for love in all forms! Remind your subscribers to treat themselves to something new, too.

title: Valentine's Day - Standard Shipping Deadline
description: Send a broadcast to your subscribers with a gentle reminder on the deadline for standard shipping.

title: Valentine's Day - 2-Day Shipping Deadline
description: Valentine's Day is right around the corner - make sure your subscribers are aware that your 2-day shipping deadline is here with a reminder to order before it's too late.

title: Valentine's Day - Gift Cards
description: Don't let your subscribers show up empty-handed on the big day! Make sure you send out a broadcast promoting instant delivery gift cards.

title: Galentine's Day
description: Leslie Knope said it best - Galentine's Day is for ladies celebrating ladies!

title: Self-Love Day
description: Turn self-care into celebration! Inspire customers to prioritize themselves with special offers that make pampering irresistible.

title: Valentine's Day
description: Build customer loyalty with genuine appreciation messages that strengthen your brand relationship.

title: Valentine's Day Sale
description: Create excitement with irresistible offers that make gift-giving (and self-gifting) even sweeter.

title: Singles Awareness Day
description: Celebrate independence and self-appreciation! Turn Singles Day into a festival of self-investment and personal joy.

title: Random Acts of Kindness Day
description: Spread joy and inspire generosity with offers that encourage both self-care and sharing.

title: Love Your Pets Day
description: Celebrate furry family members with playful messaging that resonates with pet parents.

title: World Compliment Day
description: Build genuine connections with your community. Show appreciation for loyal customers while creating meaningful two-way conversations.

title: National Snack Day
description: Satisfy cravings with irresistible offers. Present your most-loved treats and newest flavors that keep customers coming back for more.

title: National Dress Day
description: Style up special moments with fresh fashion finds. Present options that make customers feel confident and ready for any occasion.

title: National Napping Day
description: Help customers catch those z's with rest-enhancing items.

title: National Plant a Flower  Day
description: Show how your brand contributes to a greener tomorrow. Share your sustainability story and plant seeds of positive change with purpose-driven promotions.

title: National Pi Day
description: Numbers add up to savings. Give your math-loving customers a reason to calculate their cart totals with time-sensitive offers that make perfect sense.

title: International Day of Happiness
description: Spread joy through meaningful offers. Make customers' day brighter with special deals that bring real smiles to their faces.

title: National Puppy Day
description: Celebrate our four-legged friends with pet-perfect deals. Help pet parents pamper their pups with special offers on treats and essentials.

title: National Cocktail Day
description: Mix up special moments with signature offers. Shake together deals that give customers reasons to raise their glasses and celebrate.

title: National Mom and Pop Business Owners' Day
description: Share your small business story with authentic gratitude. Thank customers for choosing independent retailers while offering exclusive appreciation deals.

title: International Transgender day of Visibility
description: Stand with the transgender community through meaningful action. Support visibility initiatives while creating positive change through purpose-driven commerce.

title: Women's History Month
description: Put your brand's female leaders in focus. Share powerful stories of women making their mark while offering meaningful ways for customers to support your mission.

title: National Craft Month
description: Inspire creative minds to bring their ideas to life. Present your best tools and supplies that help makers build something remarkable.

title: End of Season Sales
description: Time for fresh starts and final chances. Move seasonal inventory while building excitement for what's coming next with deals customers won't want to miss.

title: Get Ready For Spring
description: Set the stage for brighter days with fresh selections. Present your newest items that customers need as warmer weather approaches.

title: Spring Break Sales
description: Help customers plan their perfect getaway. Showcase vacation essentials and must-have items that make travel memories last.

title: College Basketball Begins
description: Score big with fans during tournament season. Present game day essentials and team spirit items perfect for cheering sections.

title: Start of Paris Fashion Week
description: Boost your brand's allure during Paris Fashion Week. Reach out to customers effortlessly, driving meaningful engagement and business growth.

title: Fat Tuesday / Mardi Gras
description: Cue the confetti! Celebrate Mardi Gras with a flash sale on your best selling products or highlight a fan favorite.

title: Ash Wednesday
description: Connect deeply on the first day of Lent with messages of reflection and renewal to your congregation.

title: World Books Day UK
description: Celebrate World Book Day UK with a page-turner of a promotion. They're the perfect plot twist to engage your book-loving audience!

title: Employee Appreciation Day
description: Boost your brand's allure during Paris Fashion Week. Reach out to customers effortlessly, driving meaningful engagement and business growth.

title: International Women’s Day
description: Honor achievements and build lasting connections. Share how your brand supports and uplifts women while thanking customers for their role in your success.

title: Daylight Saving Time
description: Make this time change work in your favor. Send deals that help customers power through schedule shifts and spring forward with savings.

title: St.Patrick’s Day
description: Fill carts with good fortune. Give subscribers a chance to grab their own pot of gold with flash sales and limited-time offers worth celebrating.

title: Afterpay Day  Sales Starts
description: Let customers shop their wishlist worry-free. Promote flexible payment options while offering limited-time discounts on seasonal must-haves.

title: First Day of Spring
description: Mark the seasonal shift with fresh beginnings. Clear winter inventory while building buzz for new spring items that refresh and renew.

title: Afterpay Day  Sales Ends
description: Give shoppers one final chance at flexible payment savings. Target reminders to those who haven't purchased yet, creating urgency for last-minute decisions.

title: Order ahead for St. Patrick's Day
description: If you're promoting party favors, apparel, or something else that your subscribers will want in their hands on the big day, be sure to send a broadcast encouraging them to order ahead for on-time delivery.

title: St. Patrick's Day shipping deadline
description: Help customers get their lucky finds on time! Create urgency while highlighting delivery promises to drive conversions before the shipping cutoff.

title: St. Patrick's Day sale - VIP early access
description: Make your VIPs feel extra special with exclusive first access. Drive urgency by highlighting their privileged early shopping window.

title: St. Patrick's Day - sale announcement
description: Launch your sale with excitement and clear value. Give subscribers compelling reasons to shop while the luck is on their side.

title: St. Patrick's Day sale - last chance
description: Create final-hours urgency while maintaining brand voice. Drive last-minute purchases by highlighting the imminent end of special savings.

title: St. Patrick's Day - sale extension
description: Turn St. Patrick’s Day into a golden opportunity! Keep the excitement going with a surprise sale extension. Strengthen customer loyalty by making this exclusive to your VIP text subscribers.

title: April Fools' Day
description: Offer a special discount for them when they respond with the solution to your cleverly crafted riddle. April Fools' Day is the perfect occasion to engage in some lighthearted interaction!

title: World Health Day
description: Send an uplifting message, motivate your subscribers to put their health first, and suggest a relevant product or two!

title: Earth Day
description: Does your brand prioritize sustainability? Educate your audience about your eco-friendly initiatives and share your sustainability targets for 2025. Let's celebrate Earth Day by inspiring a greener future!

title: Easter Sunday
description: Freshen up your inventory and launch an Easter Sale offering sweet discounts on seasonal items. Don't miss this hop-portunity to brighten your subscribers' day!

title: Easter Monday / Last Chance
description: Final Day Frenzy: Tell your subscribers it's their last chance to snag Easter deals! Act now before these egg-straordinary savings hop away.

title: Arbor Day
description: Showcase your green practices and honor your commitment to nature.

title: National Walking Day
description: Give your subscribers a deal they'll want to stride towards. Bonus tip: Include a fun fact about the health perks of daily walks!

title: National Vitamin C Day
description: Support your subscribers by offering a special discount on Vitamin C products, helping them invest in their health and skin's vibrancy.

title: National Self-Care Day
description: Take advantage of National Self-Care Day to treat yourself and your subscribers. Roll out a limited-time flash sale or feature a spotlight on your standout self-care staples.

title: National Gang Day
description: Raise a glass to the bonds that bind us. Today, we spotlight the incredible circles of women who stand strong together. Gather your girl gang and toast to your collective strength, resilience, and endless support.

title: National Beer Day
description: Who says you need to be a brewery to join the festivities? Let's clink glasses virtually and celebrate with an exclusive offer for our loyal subscribers. Here's to good times and great beer!

title: National Siblings Day
description: Invite your subscribers to make National Siblings Day a day to remember by spoiling their siblings with a thoughtful gesture. Offer them a special today-only discount to make their gift even sweeter.

title: National Pet Day
description: Attention all pet brands: today's the day to go big! Host a sitewide sale that every pet owner can't resist. Show some love because every pet deserves nothing but the best.

title: National Gardening Day
description: No green thumbs? No problem! Help your subscribers get their garden in shape with some of the best financial savings. Dig into deals today!

title: National Exercise Day
description: Celebrate National Exercise Day by encouraging customers to upgrade their exercise essentials!

title: Get To Know Your Customers Day
description: What better occasion to engage and understand your audience than Get To Know Your Customers Day? Send out a heartfelt broadcast to your SMS subscribers and let them share their thoughts and preferences.

title: National Tea Day
description: Raise your cups to tempting discounts on cherished tea products or unlock the door to a secret sale that's just between us tea aficionados.

title: National Picnic Day
description: Get your picnic plans off to a tasty start with fantastic offers that are too good to leave behind. Shopping for deals is the perfect appetizer to a day spent outdoors!

title: National Lingerie Day
description: Unwrap an offer as captivating as your collection. Encourage your buyers with special discounts meant for self-reward or a present for someone special.

title: National Pet Parents Day
description: Our furry friends aren’t just pets; they’re family. On National Pet Parents Day, let’s celebrate with special treats and discounts. Spoil your pets because today is all about them!

title: Easter - Order Ahead
description: Be prepared for the Easter celebrations. Don’t be left hopping mad at the last minute—convince your customers to start ordering today and enjoy the festivities worry-free!

title: Easter - Gift Guide
description: Don’t let gift-giving stump your subscribers this Easter. Send them a Gift Guide packed with ideas and inspirations, ensuring their gifts are the talk of the day. Take a peek and start gifting with confidence!

title: Easter - Shipping Deadline
description: Even the Easter Bunny is on schedule! Don't fall behind—remind your subscribers of the standard shipping deadline to ensure your treats don't arrive late. Give your orders the nudge they need today.

title: Easter Sale - VIP Early Access
description: Treat your SMS list to an exclusive preview of your Easter specials. Early access not only builds anticipation but also makes your loyal subscribers feel valued.

title: Easter - General
description: Generate buzz with a bright and engaging broadcast that encapsulates the new beginnings and joy of spring.

title: Easter Sale - Last Chance
description: Nudge those still on the fence. Retarget those who peeked but didn't leap, increasing the likelihood that subscribers will convert into buyers.

title: Mother's Day Gifting Ideas
description: Support your customers in their search for the perfect Mother's Day gesture with meticulously selected items for moms. A clearly defined gift guide eases choice overload and heightens confidence in purchase decisions.

title: Mother’s Day Order Ahead
description: Kick off your Mother’s Day promotions with an emphasis on planning ahead, providing special offers as a bonus. Customers who shop early benefit from the luxury of choice and delightful incentives, all while avoiding the last-minute rush.

title: Mother's Day Gifting Ideas
description: Help navigate your customers through the gifting process with specially chosen recommendations for mothers. A detailed and well-arranged selection helps lessen overwhelm and boosts purchasing certainty.

title: Mother’s Day - Order Ahead Reminder
description: Offer your customers the advantage of preparing early. Allow early shoppers to effortlessly pick out gifts and enjoy exclusive perks, steering clear of the eleventh-hour frenzy.

title: National Teacher's Day
description: Teachers do SO much. Show them some appreciation today with a special discount code or by donating to an organization that directly helps teachers and their classrooms.

title: National Fitness Day
description: Get in shape for summer! Health & Fitness brands: encourage your subscribers to use your services or purchase your tools by offering them a healthy discount.

title: Star Wars Day
description: May these deals be with you…Celebrate this fun day in a galaxy not so far away with a forceful flash sale!

title: Cinco de Mayo
description: Not a food & beverage brand? Send subscribers your 5 best deals of the day, run a 5-day flash sale or simply keep things festive by having a big savings fiesta.

title: Kentucky Derby Day
description: Subscribers will want to race you for the deals you're offering today. The "finish line" is at midnight tonight, so make them hurry!

title: National Beverage Day
description: Quench your subscribers thirst with a mouth-watering deal for National Beverage Day. Cheers!

title: National Nurses Day
description: Nurses endure so much, especially over the past few years. Don't forget to shout them out on National Nurses Day!

title: National Clean Your Room Day
description: Ask your subscribers to help your brand do a little spring cleaning by promoting your clearance items.

title: Mother's Day
description: Celebrate mom and all the mother figures today. Send a heartfelt non-transactional message or make mom feel appreciated with a sweet discount.

title: National Dog Mom Day
description: Give a shout-out to all dog moms and offer them a fur-tastic discount that will have tails wagging.

title: International Family Day
description: Celebrate the importance of family with a message in line with your brand voice. Or run a promotion and have your subscribers refer a family member and get $__ off their next order.

title: National Piercing Day
description: Body Art brands: Encourage your subscribers to show off their love for piercing on social media and offer them special piercing deals.

title: National Love a Tree Day
description: Whether you sell plants, gardening tools, or eco-friendly products, today's the perfect day to shoutout your products or donate to a good cause!

title: National Dog Rescue Day
description: Everybody loves seeing happy dog faces! Encourage your subscribers to post a selfie on social media with their rescue pup using a unique hashtag.

title: National Wine Day
description: Not a wine brand? Subscribers are always thirsty for sales. Say cheers and bottom's up to a 24-hr flash sale.

title: National Sunscreen Day
description: Health, skincare & beauty brands: Send an informative message emphasizing the importance of wearing sunscreen.

title: National Smile Day
description: You know what they say, "smile and the world smiles with you." Make your subscribers smile today with a giveaway or a major sweepstakes event.

title: World Bee Day
description: Let’s hear it for the bees! Use today to encourage your subscribers to protect our buzzing buddies, care for the planet, and keep the hive alive—because without bees, there’s no us!

title: Summer sale - announcement
description: The start of summer means longer days, warmer weather, and bold opportunities! Excite your customers with a special summer sale that sparks excitement and sets the tone for the season ahead.

title: Summer sale - reminder
description: The clock is ticking on those summer savings! Encourage your subscribers to act fast with a reminder message. For a strategic boost, follow up with potential buyers who haven’t completed their purchase after showing initial interest.

title: Summer sale - last call
description: Don’t let your subscribers miss out! Send a "last call" message for your summer sale before they check out of their inbox for summer travels and fun in the sun.

title: Summer clearance
description: Nothing says summer like exclusive deals! Make your VIP subscribers feel valued by giving them early access to your big summer clearance event. They’ll appreciate the VIP treatment!

title: Summer giveaway
description: Get your subscribers in the summer spirit with a hot giveaway! Opt for a broad announcement to all or spice things up with an exclusive, SMS-only special offer.

title: Summer adventures
description: Stoke the spirit of summer escapades in your subscribers with captivating SMS prompts that beckon them to the great outdoors.

title: Summer travel
description: Jet set in style! Broadcast to your subscribers about essential travel must-haves and introduce them to your latest vacation-ready collection. Make every journey unforgettable!

title: First day of summer
description: Shoutout to the first day of summer! Send a broadcast wishing your subscribers a wonderful day, or promote a sunshine ready product.

title: Black Lives Matter Month
description: Did you know that customers are more likely to buy from brands that support social causes? Show your support for Black Lives Matter all month long.

title: Men's Health Month
description: Health & wellness brands: highlight your products and the ways they can benefit your male customers during Men's Health Month.

title: Graduation Season
description: Graduation season is a great opportunity to run flash sales on special gifts or share a Graduation Gift Guide.

title: Wedding Season
description: It's wedding season! Make sure your subscribers have everything need to turn heads at their next event.

title: Summer Collections
description: Encourage your subscribers to refresh their warm weather wardrobe with a spotlight on your new collection.

title: Summer Travel
description: Make sure your subscribers have everything they need for their next getaway, whether it's a sale on bestsellers or a must-have travel product.

title: Summer Picnics & BBQs
description: Sunshine, picnics, and bbqs, oh my! Make sure your subscribers are ready to host their next outdoor gathering.

title: National Camping Month
description: Inspire your subscribers to get out and explore the great outdoors during National Camping Month with a spotlight on your top selling outdoor products or a flash sale.

title: National Running Day
description: Encourage your subscribers to lace up their shoes and get those legs moving by sharing a motivational message or run a sale on running gear that's sure to get them pumped.

title: National Best Friends Day
description: Besties are everything! Invite your subscribers to give a shout-out to their bestie on your socials and run a BOGO promo for friends.

title: Global Wellness Day
description: Highlight the importance of taking care of yourself with a sale or share tips and tricks on living a more healthy lifestyle.

title: National Flip Flop Day
description: National Flip Flop Day

title: National Selfie Day
description: National Selfie Day

title: International Yoga Day
description: International Yoga Day

title: National Pink Day
description: National Pink Day

title: National Hydration Day
description: National Hydration Day

title: National Sunglasses Day
description: National Sunglasses Day

title: National Social Media Day
description: National Social Media Day

title: Order Ahead for 4th of July Weekend Reminder
description: Don't let your customers miss out on the 4th of July fun! Send out a friendly reminder to shop early and ensure they're all set for the celebrations.

title: 4th of July - Sale Kickoff
description: Starting the 4th of July celebrations early? Make sure your subscribers know so they have plenty of time to shop!

title: National Bourbon Day
description: Celebrate this day with the official spirit of America. Not a beverage brand? Celebrate with a sale for your subscribers. Cheers!

title: Father's Day
description: Celebrate dad and all the father figures today! Send a heartfelt message in appreciation of dad or send dad a special discount.

title: Juneteenth
description: Send a celebratory and informative message on this special day, commemorating the end of slavery.

title: Father's Day - Order Ahead
description: It's never too early to start planning for Father's Day! Send a broadcast to your subscribers offering a discount for ordering early.

title: Shop For Father Figures
description: Father's Day isn't exclusively for those who are related to your subscribers by blood! Encourage those to shop for every "dad" on their list.

title: Father's Day - Shipping Deadline
description: Nobody likes to be the one at the party empty-handed! Send out a broadcast to your subscribers letting them know what the deadline for on-time delivery is.

title: Father's Day: Last-Minute Gifting/Gift Cards
description: We get it, dads can be hard to shop for. Encourage your subscribers to opt for a gift card instead - delivered straight to their inbox!

title: Father's Day Sale
description: Celebrate Father's Day with a broadcast wishing them well and offering a sitewide sale for a limited time.

title: Happy Father's Day - Inclusive Messaging
description: Support your subscribers' love for all the important men in their lives, including those who are father figures.

title: Father's Day Sale Extended
description: If you extend your Father's Day sale, make sure your subscribers know about it! Pro tip - send this extension message to a segment of those who received your previous sale broadcast, but didn't purchase.

title: End of Season Sale
description: Goodbye Spring, hello Summer! Make way for new arrivals with a broadcast spotlighting your clearance items.

title: National Camera Day
description: This is the perfect time to snap a memory, strike a pose, and show some love for the tech that helps us freeze-frame life’s best moments. Today’s the day to celebrate the magic of a good photo, the power of storytelling, and all the fun that fits inside a frame.

title: Micro-, Small, and Medium-sized Enterprises (MSME) Day
description: Today, we celebrate the heroes behind Micro, Small, and Medium-sized Enterprises — the heart and soul of our neighborhoods. This is the perfect time to cheer on these champs and remember: big things start small!

title: National Chocolate Pudding Day
description: Today’s the perfect day to celebrate this smooth, creamy treat that makes any day sweeter. Whether it’s a snack or dessert, chocolate pudding brings smiles and yum to everyone. So grab a spoon, dig in, and savor the chocolaty goodness — because life’s better with pudding!

title: World Rainforest Day
description: Today is all about loving and protecting the wild, green rainforests that keep our air clean, homes full of life, and the planet healthy. So let’s stand tall for the trees and all the creatures that call them home!

title: International Surfing Day
description: Catch those waves and celebrate! International Surfing Day is all about honoring the ocean, the thrill of riding waves, and protecting our beaches. It’s a day to feel the splash, respect the sea, and keep the surf spots clean and wild—because without waves, surfing’s just a dream!

title: National Martini Day
description: Raise your glasses high! Today is National Martini Day—a perfect excuse to shake, stir, and sip your favorite cocktail. Whether you like it dry, dirty, or with a twist, this day is all about celebrating the classy, cool, and timeless martini.

title: International Sushi Day
description: Let’s roll out the wasabi! Use today to remind your subscribers to celebrate the art (and yumminess) of sushi. Whether they love spicy tuna, veggie rolls, or sashimi, today’s the perfect time to show some love to this bite-sized beauty.

title: National Eat Your Vegetables Day
description: Use today to remind your subscribers to fuel up with veggies, try something new from the garden, or sneak some spinach into their smoothie. From broccoli to bell peppers, veggies keep us strong, happy, and full of crunch.

title: National Photography Day
description: Say cheese! Today’s the day to celebrate all the snapshots, selfies, and silly group pics that make life brighter. Use National Photography Day to remind your subscribers to capture the good times, show off their favorite shots, and keep making memories—because every picture tells a story worth sharing.

title: National Children's Day
description: Celebrate the little ones today with a special sale or Children's Day shout out that is sure to make both kids and parents happy.

title: World Oceans Day
description: Celebrate World Oceans Day with a broadcast spotlighting your brand's sustainable efforts or partnership with a meaningful organization.

title: National Trails Day
description: Use today to encourage your subscribers to get outside, breathe in the fresh air, and show love to our wild paths. From peaceful strolls to mountain climbs, trails connect us to nature—and each other. Step outside and leave only footprints!

title: National Donut Day
description: Use today to encourage your subscribers to treat themselves to something sweet, sprinkle kindness like confetti, and celebrate the little joys that make life extra delicious—because every day is better with a donut (or two)!

title: World Environment Day
description: Celebrate World Environment Day by highlighting your partnerships or share information about your eco-friendly products and/or packaging.

title: World Bicycle Day
description: Let’s roll for the planet! Use today to encourage your subscribers to hop on two wheels, feel the breeze, and ride toward a cleaner, healthier world—because every pedal helps the planet (and our hearts) go 'round!

title: National I Love My Dentist Day
description: Use today to encourage your subscribers to show some love to the smile savers who keep our teeth shiny, our breath fresh, and our confidence beaming—because behind every great smile is an awesome dentist!

title: World Reef Awareness Day
description: Use today to encourage your subscribers to protect our coral kingdoms, care for the oceans, and help keep the seas full of life—because when reefs thrive, the whole planet wins!

title: National Skincare Day
description: Let’s hear it for healthy skin! Use today to encourage your subscribers to show their skin some love, build good skincare habits, and glow from the inside out—because happy skin = happy you!

title: Plastic Free July
description: Encourage subscribers to ditch single-use plastics by promoting sustainable products and sharing simple swaps.

title: Independent Retailer Month
description: Remind your audience that shopping small goes a long way. Celebrate your independence and theirs.

title: National Grilling Month
description: Sizzle your way into July with outdoor-friendly promos, BBQ tools, or seasonal recipes.

title: National Picnic Month
description: Celebrate sunny days with portable must-haves perfect for the backyard, beach, or trail.

title: Summer Collections
description: The temps are rising—get your audience thinking about bold prints, airy fabrics, and new warm-weather staples.

title: 4th of July Weekend - Sale Kickoff
description: Get the 4th of July celebration rolling! Drop a friendly SMS to help the anticipation—and web traffic—build up.

title: 4th of July Weekend - Sale Reminder
description: Don’t let your sale be forgotten! Send a simple, impactful SMS reminder to keep your customers excited for your 4th of July weekend deals.

title: Happy 4th of July Message
description: Use our SMS template to send a warm, friendly "Happy 4th of July" message that keeps your brand top of mind and shows you care.

title: 4th of July Sale - Last Chance
description: Your sale’s about to end—get the word out fast! Use our SMS template to spark urgency and make sure your customers grab the deals before they’re gone.

title: 4th of July Sale - Extension
description: Good news travels fast—your 4th of July sale just got extended! Let your customers know they have 24-48 extra hours to snag the deals before they disappear for good.

title: Summer Travel
description: Make sure your subscribers have everything they need for their next getaway, whether it's a sale on bestsellers or a must-have travel product.

title: Summer Activities
description: Sunshine and warmer weather is on the horizon. Get your subscribers excited for the fun months ahead!

title: Summer Picnics & BBQs
description: Sunshine, picnics, and bbqs, oh my! Make sure your subscribers are ready to host their next outdoor gathering.

title: Canada Day
description: Cue the fireworks! If you're a Canadian brand, or ship to Canada, delight your subscribers with a flash sale to celebrate the anniversary of Canada's Constitution Act.

title: National Bikini Day
description: What's a summer without a new swimsuit? Celebrate National Bikini Day with a product spotlight or a Broadcast encouraging your subscribers to show off their new threads with a post on social media.

title: World Chocolate Day
description: Chocolate lovers, rejoice! Show off one of your best-selling chocolate products or host a flash sale: a sweet treat for your subscribers.

title: National Kitten Day
description: Pet brands: don't miss out on this fur-tastic opportunity to send a Broadcast to your subscribers on National Kitten Day! Celebrate with a flash sale on a top-seller or highlight a fan-favorite product with a stellar customer review.

title: World Emoji Day
description: Strengthen your brand's relationship with your subscribers by hosting a giveaway on social media or setting up an Experience for subscribers to reply to your messages with their favorite emoji for an exclusive discount code.

title: Get to Know Your Customers Day
description: Nurture your subscribers and learn more about them by asking a question or sending out a survey asking for their honest feedback.

title: National Ice Cream Day
description: Who doesn't love an excuse to celebrate ice cream? Help your subscribers cool off with a deal on best-selling products.

title: National Tequila Day
description: Send your subscribers a virtual cheers 🥂 for National Tequila Day! Take advantage of the holiday to promote a special bottle to your subscribers or encourage them to shop a flash sale.

title: International Self-Care Day
description: Who doesn't love an excuse for a little self-care? Celebrate the holiday with a flash sale, product spotlight, or just encourage your subscribers to take time for themselves today!

title: National Parents' Day
description: Being a parent is no walk in the park. Encourage your subscribers to treat themselves (or parental figures) to something new, and on sale, for one day only!

title: National Lipstick Day
description: Host a buy more, save more event on best-selling lipsticks or encourage your subscribers to post their favorite shade on social media for a chance to win a free product.

title: National Avocado Day
description: Got a brand-new recipe featuring your best-selling product to show off to your subscribers? Make sure you include a shout out to the honorary ingredient: avocado!

title: National Clean Beauty Day
description: Share an educational Broadcast with your subscribers on your brand's mission on clean beauty or spotlight your best-selling products and their ingredients.

title: International Day of Friendship
description: Celebrate the beauty of friendship with a BOGO deal for your subscribers and one for their bestie!

title: Back to School
description: Boost engagement this back-to-school season. Whether promoting school essentials or showcasing stylish must-haves, these ready-to-use messages make connecting with parents, students, and educators effortless and effective.

title: End of Summer Sale - Initial
description: Engage customers with irresistible offers on collections and clearance items, sans the hassle of codes. These templates are your shortcut to boosting sales and saying goodbye to summer with one last season's haul.

title: End of Summer Sale - Follow-up
description: Remind customers of the fleeting chance to snag summer favorites at exclusive discounts, with or without the need for promo codes.

title: End of Summer Sale - Last Chance
description: Capitalize on the final moments of your End of Summer Sale with our Last Chance SMS templates. Encourage customers not to miss out on one last opportunity for substantial savings.

title: Labor Day Collection
description: Hey hey! Labor Day’s rolling in and so is our brand-new Labor Day Collection. Fresh picks, cozy finds — just waiting for you to snag ‘em!

title: Labor Day - Sale Teaser
description: Build anticipation for your Labor Day promotion with a strategic teaser campaign. Early awareness drives higher engagement when your sale actually launches.

title: Labor Day - VIP Early Access
description: Reward your most loyal customers with exclusive early access to your Labor Day deals. VIP treatment builds stronger customer relationships and drives immediate sales.

title: Happy Labor Day
description: Hats off to the go-getters! Use today to remind your subscribers to hit pause, soak up some chill time, and feel proud of how hard they work every single day.

title: Labor Day - Sale Kickoff
description: Launch your Labor Day sale with maximum impact. Weekend shoppers are ready to spend - capture their attention immediately.

title: Labor Day - Sale Reminder
description: Target subscribers who haven't engaged with your initial sale message. Reminder campaigns often outperform launch messages for conversion rates.

title: Labor Day - Sale Last Chance
description: Create urgency with a final opportunity message. Last chance campaigns typically see the highest conversion rates of any sale sequence.

title: Labor Day - Sale Extension
description: Surprise and delight subscribers with extended sale access. Target cart abandoners and browsers for maximum impact.

title: Fall Preview
description: Shift your messaging from sun to sweater weather with a timely promo! Whether it’s a flash sale to clear out summer stock or a sneak peek at your cozy new fall collection, now’s the perfect moment to get your subscribers clicking.

title: New Fall Collection
description: Show off your latest fall arrivals and spark excitement for sweater weather and cozy vibes!

title: Fall Restock
description: Got a fan favorite back on the shelves? Don’t keep your subscribers guessing—let them snag it before it’s gone!

title: Fall Sale
description: Kick off the season with a flash sale to get your customers excited and boost early holiday sales!

title: Pumpkin Spice Season
description: Embrace the pumpkin spice craze and connect with your subscribers through seasonal fun and irresistible promos!

title: First Day of Fall
description: Kick off the new season with a special offer or product spotlight! It’s the perfect moment to get your subscribers excited to cozy up for fall.

title: Fall Friends & Family Sale
description: Treat your subscribers like VIPs with an exclusive fall deal! Give them special savings on back-to-school must-haves or brand-new seasonal arrivals.

title: Football & Tailgating Season
description: Fire up your subscribers for kickoff with unbeatable deals on tailgating must-haves, winning recipes, or sporty game day gear.

title: World Gratitude Day
description: Thanksgiving isn't here yet, but it's never too early to give thanks to your subscribers! Show them you're grateful with a message of appreciation or a 24-hour promo code.

title: National Beer Lover’s Day
description: Let’s toast to the brew crew! Use National Beer Lover’s Day to get your subscribers raising a glass, trying a new pour, and stocking up on beer-lover must-haves—because life’s better with a cold one in hand!

title: First Day of Hispanic Heritage Month
description: Celebrate the vibrant start of Hispanic Heritage Month! Use today to invite your subscribers to honor rich traditions, share colorful stories, and uplift the voices that keep this culture alive—because these roots make us all stronger!

title: National Cooking Day
description: Time to turn up the heat! Use National Cooking Day to get your subscribers excited to try new recipes, stock up on fresh kitchen gear, and save while they’re at it—because tasty meals start with the right tools!

title: National Coffee Day
description: Let’s raise a mug to National Coffee Day! Use today to invite your subscribers to pour a fresh cup, try bold new blends, and score sweet savings—because great coffee makes every day brighter!

title: National Beach Day
description: Grab your shades—It’s National Beach Day! Use today to inspire your subscribers to hit the sand, pack their beach bags, and score a sunny discount—because every perfect beach day starts with the right gear!

title: National Wellness Month
description: Take a deep breath—it’s National Wellness Month! Use this month to remind your subscribers to slow down, recharge, and grab self-care essentials with a sweet discount—because when we take care of ourselves, we shine brighter for everyone!

title: National Relaxation Day
description: Time to kick your feet up—It’s National Relaxation Day! Use today to inspire your subscribers to slow down, grab comfy must-haves, and snag a sweet deal—because we all deserve a moment to relax and just be.

title: Labor Day Greeting
description: Hats off to the go-getters! Use today to remind your subscribers to hit pause, soak up some chill time, and feel proud of how hard they work every single day.

title: National Pet Wellness Month
description: Pets are family! Use SMS templates to spotlight wellness tips or products that keep furry friends healthy and happy. Your customers will appreciate it.

title: Breast Cancer Awareness Month
description: Make every message count. October is the perfect time to spotlight causes that matter, like Breast Cancer Awareness Month.

title: Fair Trade Month
description: If your brand is committed to the fair trade movement, now is a good time to broadcast an educational message on how fair trade strengthens our global economy. Seize this moment to highlight your dedication and make a significant impact.

title: Hispanic Heritage Month
description: Highlight your Latin-owned business or champion a cause this Hispanic Heritage Month. Honor this vibrant culture with a simple SMS!

title: Football & Tailgating Season
description: Football season is here! Use SMS templates to highlight top products, ignite interest, and drive sales. Not sure where to start? Launch flash sales or spotlight seasonal must-haves fans will love.

title: Friends & Family Sales
description: Turn subscribers into family! Offer exclusive Friends & Family deals on bestsellers, certain products, or even sitewide. Increase sales and loyalty in one go.

title: Halloween - VIP Early Access
description: Delight your VIPs with early access to your Halloween deals! Treat them to exclusive savings, and increase chances to watch their loyalty build & your ROI soar.

title: Halloween - Sale Announcement
description: Boo-st your Halloween sales by ensuring your subscribers don't miss out! Use our SMS templates to send playful sale announcements, enticing subscribers to grab their favorites while they last.

title: Halloween - Sale Reminder / Expedited Shipping
description: Spook up the urgency! Send a chilling 'Last Chance' SMS blast to your subscribers and drive home those final-hour Halloween sales.

title: Halloween - Sale Last Chance / Overnight Shipping
description: Spook up the urgency! Send a chilling 'Last Chance' SMS blast to your subscribers and drive home those final-hour Halloween sales.

title: Halloween - Promote Financing Options
description: Don't let financial fears haunt your customers! Remind them of payment plans that make every Halloween haul possible. Help them celebrate Halloween to the fullest.

title: Halloween - Promote Halloween Products
description: Treat your customers to irresistible offers! Spotlight your seasonal products and inspire customers to shop now.

title: Happy Halloween
description: Our SMS templates can help you send out enchanting Halloween greetings, keeping your brand in their hearts as the holidays approach.

title: National Hair Day
description: Get your customers excited about National Hair Day. Perfect for promoting product sales, booking appointments, or simply celebrating fabulous hair!

title: National Vegetarian Day
description: It's your chance to plant a lasting impression with promotional offers that cater to the vegetarians and veg-curious alike. A perfect way to highlight your brand’s commitment to healthier choices and a healthier planet. Let's make every bite count!

title: National Techies Day
description: This is the perfect event to connect with innovators and tech enthusiasts. Make your brand shine, offering personalized discounts, updates, and promotions that resonate with techies.

title: National Boyfriend Day
description: Let love lead the way! Share promotions that make their celebration more meaningful—while driving engagement for your brand. Help customers find perfect gifts, memorable experiences, and exclusive deals for their loved ones.

title: National Golf Lover's Day
description: Help your customers ace their game! Use SMS templates to share exclusive offers on golf gear and equipment while keeping you ahead of the competition.

title: World Smile Day
description: Engage with your audience in a way that spreads cheer and appreciation—start a selfie giveaway contest. Ask them to post a selfie with your product for the chance to win a fantastic reward. It's a win-win: they get the glory, you get the story.

title: National Do Something Nice Day
description: Here are a few ideas: Surprise customers with a complimentary gift on purchases for one day only. Run a flash sale to incentivize & reward spontaneous acts of kindness. Encourage your customers to do something nice for someone else!

title: World Teachers' Day
description: Express gratitude, share inspiring messages, or offer exclusive discounts on wellness products, indulgent services, or stress-relief items for teachers.

title: National Taco Day
description: Invite your customers to a mouthwatering celebration with special deals. Partner with local taco joints to offer a joint promotion or special discounts to bring in traffic and share customer bases.

title: Long Weekend Sale
description: There’s no better way to celebrate extra off-time than with a Long Weekend Sale. Give your subscribers a golden ticket to shop the trends they love at prices they'll adore.

title: Indigenous Peoples' Day
description: Let your brand be a beacon of support with SMS campaigns that not only enlighten but also give back. Honor Indigenous traditions and crafts while supporting local causes.

title: World Mental Health Day
description: Show your care by sending subscribers a gentle reminder to put themselves first, focus on self-care, and take a moment to breathe. Thoughtful, simple gestures can go a long way.

title: National Handbag Day
description: It's the perfect time to launch a new handbag design! Offer discounted handbag personalization services, such as monogramming, as a one-day event.

title: National Dessert Day
description: National Dessert Day is here, and it’s time to treat your susbcribers to scrumptious sweets. Today is the day to celebrate all things sweet, creamy, and utterly irresistible!

title: World Food Day
description: Embrace the spirit of global cuisine. Feature hourly discounts on specific products representing different global cuisines throughout World Food Day.

title: National Sports Day
description: Rally your customers with jerseys, gear, and all the essentials for a perfect game day! Engage fans by inviting them to predict game outcomes for chances to win branded merchandise or discounts.

title: Sweetest Day
description: Encourage customers to buy a gift for someone else by offering a discount on their next purchase. You can also offer special rewards, points, or discounts to returning customers as a sweet thank you for their loyalty.

title: National Pumpkin Day
description: Curate a selection of pumpkin-themed products, from food items to decor, available for one day only. It's also a great chance to invite customers to share their favorite pumpkin-based food in exchange for a discount code.

title: National Chocolate Day
description: It's time for a cocoa-infused celebration with tempting offers on all things chocolate. Charm your clients and entice their palates with delightful discounts that make every purchase a joyous occasion.

title: National Cat Day
description: For every product bought, donate the same item to a shelter cat in need. This can encourage larger purchases while supporting animal welfare. Your customers will feel good about choosing your products, too.

title: National Treat Your Pet Day
description: Offer curated “treat packs” with discounts that match your customers’ pets’ needs: toys, treats, and grooming items. Or give discounts/freebies for customers who sign up for monthly treat or toy subscription boxes.

title: National Gratitude Month
description: Thank loyal SMS subscribers with month-long perks. Offer free shipping, early access, or a sitewide discount as a thank-you. It’s the perfect warm-up for your Thanksgiving and BFCM traffic—while showing appreciation in a low-pressure way.

title: Movember
description: If your brand speaks to men—or supports men’s health—Movember is a smart campaign to rally behind. Whether you’re raising awareness or donating proceeds, a clear message can inspire action. Add impact by naming the organization or cause you’re backing.

title: Last year’s BFCM customers
description: Reconnect with shoppers who bought during last year’s BFCM. These warm leads already know your brand—and they’re likely to come back with the right nudge. Use their past purchase behavior to craft timely, exclusive offers.

title: Last Day of Thanksgiving Shipping
description: Create bundle deals that combine several Thanksgiving items that offer savings and encourage larger orders. If not, promote gift cards as a perfect last-minute addition to any order so your subscribers can still gift something if they miss the shipping deadline.

title: Thanksgiving
description: Take a break from sales to send a heartfelt thank-you. A personal message can go a long way in building customer love—no promo needed.

title: Black Friday Sale Teaser
description: Hype up your Black Friday sale with a teaser broadcast. Let subscribers know when it drops and what they can expect—without giving it all away.

title: Black Friday VIP Early Access
description: Reward your SMS list with early access to Black Friday deals. This gives subscribers a head start and makes your texts feel exclusive.

title: Black Friday Sale Announcement
description: It’s time! Announce your Black Friday deals loud and proud. Share the % off, how long it lasts, and how to redeem.

title: Black Friday Sale Reminder
description: Keep the momentum going! Black Friday weekend is still in full swing—send a timely reminder so your subscribers don’t forget to take advantage of your biggest sale of the year.

title: Black Friday Last Chance
description: Time to close it out strong. Let subscribers know this is the final call for Black Friday savings—create urgency and encourage one last push before the clock runs out.

title: Black Friday Sale Extension
description: Surprise! You’re giving subscribers one more chance to score deals. Let them know your Black Friday Sale has been extended—but not for long.

title: Small Business Saturday
description: Celebrate your brand’s roots and community with a heartfelt offer. Use this moment to thank customers for supporting small—and invite them to shop with purpose.

title: Cyber Monday
description: The biggest Monday in ecommerce is here. Announce your Cyber Monday deals loud and clear—and let subscribers know it’s time to stock up before it’s over.

title: World Vegan Day
description: World Vegan Day is your moment to spotlight plant-based products or values. Whether you’re fully vegan or just offer vegan options, highlight what makes you a conscious brand.

title: Stress Awareness Day
description: Remind subscribers to take a breather. Use this day to highlight your wellness products—or just share a thoughtful message with helpful tips to relieve stress.

title: Día de los Muertos
description: Honor a meaningful day of remembrance and culture. Whether you're sending a heartfelt note or a respectful promo, make sure your message is thoughtful and inclusive.

title: National Accessory Day
description: Time to shine! Whether you’re launching something new or spotlighting bestsellers, help your subscribers find the perfect finishing touch.

title: National Candy Day
description: Sweeten up your promos! Whether or not you sell candy, you can still treat subscribers to exclusive deals that make them smile.

title: National Donut Day
description: Sprinkle a little fun into your broadcast calendar! Offer your subscribers a deal that’s just as sweet as their favorite treat.

title: Daylight Saving
description: Shorter days, longer nights—give your subscribers something cozy to look forward to. It’s the perfect time for comfort-forward promos.

title: Veterans Day
description: Send a thoughtful message or offer that honors the military community. Keep it respectful, simple, and sincere.

title: Singles Day
description: Celebrate self-love and flying solo. Whether it’s a little treat or a big splurge, invite your subscribers to shop just for them.

title: National Happy Hour Day
description: Cheers to surprise savings! Use this fun holiday to send a flash deal, time-sensitive code, or simply give your audience something to raise a glass to.

title: World Kindness Day
description: Today’s all about good vibes and thoughtful gestures. Thank your community with a meaningful offer or simple note of appreciation.

title: National Philanthropy Day
description: Let your customers in on your mission. Show how your brand gives back and invite them to be part of the impact.

title: National Recycling Day
description: A great chance to highlight your brand’s commitment to sustainability. Whether through donation, education, or product spotlight, make it count.

title: National Hiking Day
description: Encourage your audience to get outdoors! Spotlight products for adventurers or run a promo perfect for trail-lovers.

title: National Espresso Day
description: Fuel your promo calendar with something bold! Whether it’s actual coffee or just a fun tie-in, get your customers buzzing.

title: Giving Tuesday
description: It’s the season of giving. If you’re partnering with an organization or donating proceeds to a cause, let your subscribers know how their purchase can make a real impact.
